summary: Utility module that serializes and deserializes Arkouda data structures—including numeric arrays, string collections, and categorical data—to and from persistent storage formats like HDF5 and Parquet, managing metadata, dataset preparation, and error handling.
business_intent: Allow users of the Arkouda distributed analytics platform to efficiently persist large in‑memory datasets to disk and later reload them, facilitating data sharing, checkpointing, and integration with external data processing pipelines.
